name: Lust From The Past [XXX Complete Minigame]
name_original: Lust From The Past [XXX Complete Minigame]
description:
Plot: Often friendships are lost over time... once as a child you felt a sincere bond with an old friend of yours. After tons of years you receive a call: it's her and she wants to meet you. Prepare for the date that will change your life. 

If you like these games, consider supporting our projects on www.patreon.com/kravenar
